name: NETXP LINUX Virtualization - QEMU System x86_64 usage
description: Monitors the execution of QEMU system emulation (qemu-system-x86_64), providing visibility into virtualization-related activities on the system. Detection of QEMU system emulation activities helps in monitoring virtualization operations and potential security risks, also monitors execution of QEMU image utility (qemu-img), providing visibility into virtualization-related activities on the system and the execution of QEMU-KVM (qemu-kvm),
author: Szymon Gluch
query:
//any where auditd.log.key: "qemu-system-x86_64" or auditd.log.key: "qemu-img" or auditd.log.key: "qemu-kvm" or auditd.log.key: "qemu" and
any where event.module: "auditd"
